snippet.title: Lionheart | Amiga Longplay (Hardest, Best Ending) [50 fps]
snippet.description:
0:00 Intros
3:54 Swamps I
8:20 Spider Cave I
10:59 Swamps II
18:40 Spider Cave II
23:39 Swamps III
33:39 Swamp Boss
34:56 Ancient City I
41:58 Ancient City II
47:48 Ancient City III
55:40 Volcano
59:02 Secret Level
1:03:19 Volcano (Continued)
1:05:06 Boss
1:06:32 Air-Ship
1:15:54 Flying Dragon
1:23:34 Boss
1:25:20 Citadel
1:27:32 Final Bosses
1:30:15 Final Boss Final Hit & Ending

Aesthetically, one of the best games of the 16-bit era. The gameplay needs a bit getting used to - you hold FIRE and then hit a direction to attack - but the visuals and the music are among the best in action platformers from the early/mid 90s.

This was Thalion's last action game.
An Amiga exclusive, it was never ported to 16-bit consoles.

LINKS/ INFO/ REVIEWS:
* Amiga Magazine Rack http://amr.abime.net/amr_search.php?search=lionheart&mag_id=0&action=Find
* HG101 http://www.hardcoregaming101.net/lionheart/
* Lemon Amiga https://www.lemonamiga.com/games/details.php?id=687
* Amiga Reviews https://www.amigareviews.leveluphost.com/lionhear.htm
* Moby Games https://www.mobygames.com/game/lionheart
